thread.title: The Walking Dead Airs Hilarious Super Bowl Ad
thread.title_full: The Walking Dead Airs Hilarious Super Bowl Ad

author: Charlie Ridgely
title: The Walking Dead Airs Hilarious Super Bowl Ad
text:
The Walking Dead Airs Hilarious Super Bowl Ad Charlie Ridgely Start Photo Gallery Back to Article Image of 
While the Super Bowl may reign supreme this Sunday night, fans of The Walking Dead are patiently waiting for next week. 
Sunday, February 12 sees the long-awaited midseason premiere of AMC's hit zombie drama, and the network teased the return in the most hilarious way possible. 
During the Super Bowl, The Walking Dead aired a small promo. All you can see for about 10 seconds, is a football laying on the ground. Just when you think that's all it is going to be, Lucille comes out of nowhere and smashes the ball. 
After Negan 's Dirty Girl destroys the innocent football, the words appear on the screen, "FOOTBALL SEASON IS OVER!" 
To end the trailer, it was announced that The Walking Dead would return next Sunday. The Walking Dead returns for the rest of its seventh season on February 12 at 9 p.m. ET on AMC . Fear the Walking Dead 's third season does not yet have a premiere date but with The Walking Dead finale set for April 2, expectations for Fear 's return are set for April 9. For complete coverage and insider info all season long, follow @BrandonDavisBD on Twitter. MORE WALKING DEAD:
